markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs=""
>
[Murderer's Circle](/Feats.aspx?ID=2214) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing](/Sources.aspx?ID=48) pg. 79

**Archetype** [Provocator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=87)

**Prerequisites**
[Provocator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2211)

</column>

---

You Strike a target within reach and then Step to any other open space adjacent to that target. Your target is then [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against your next Strike this turn.
name: Murderer's Circle

<summary>
Circle your foe while you beat on them.
</summary>
